thread.title: Musgrave finding the right potion for Raiders’offense
thread.title_full: Musgrave finding the right potion for Raiders’offense - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ron Kroichick
title: Musgrave finding the right potion for Raiders’offense
text:
Photo: Jeff Chiu, Associated Press Oakland Raiders offensive coordinator Bill Musgrave, left, talks with head coach Jack Del Rio during NFL football practice, Tuesday, June 2, 2015, in Alameda, Calif. (AP Photo/Jeff Chiu) Oakland Raiders offensive coordinator Bill Musgrave, left, talks...
Two weeks ago, Bill Musgrave was the bum who runs the Raiders’ offense. They didn’t score in the first three quarters of their season-opening loss to Cincinnati. They looked terrible. Same old Raiders, right? Oakland Raiders offensive coordinator Bill Musgrave, left, talks with head coach Jack Del Rio during NFL football practice, Tuesday, June 2, 2015, in Alameda, Calif. (AP Photo/Jeff Chiu) Oakland Raiders offensive coordinator Bill Musgrave, left, talks...
Two weeks ago, Bill Musgrave was the bum who runs the Raiders’ offense. They didn’t score in the first three quarters of their season-opening loss to Cincinnati. They looked terrible. Same old Raiders, right?
